name: TinyWorld (Dink Games)
description:
Requires Python 3 & Pygame

NOTE: Multiplayer mode is still in development!

Controls:

--Menu--

UP/DOWN Arrows - Navigate through Menus

Return - Select that menu

--Game--

 Q - Saves the game then quits to menu.

 R - Reloads the Save

 Arrow Keys - Move the Block/Player

 S - Enables "Sight Mode" (This is for Future Releases, This is useless now)

 Z - Crouch

 LCONTROL - Places Block

 LALT - Mines Block

 SHIFT - Sprint

F5 - Debug Toggle (On By Default)

F4 - Collide Mode

--Latest Update Changes--

Updated 1/20/22

Fixed Bugs for Full Screen

More Optimized For Low Ends (eg. raspberry pi)

New UI for Playing
